title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The UKG Scholar Program strengthens your child’s academic foundation before entering primary school. We align with your school's curriculum and fully support classwork, tests, assignments, and projects. Children deepen their reading, writing, math, and general awareness skills — all while continuing to explore creativity, imagination, and structured learning.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Maths, EVS, Art, GK, Cognitive Skills, Moral Education, Storytelling, and Environmental Awareness.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- All school tests and assignments fully supported
- Theme-based weekly plans to reinforce classroom learning
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard with insights and goals
- Merit Badges to reward creativity, effort, and subject mastery
- Builds readiness for Class 1 with confidence and clarity

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
At the UKG level, CodeVoyagers encourages your child to develop problem-solving and logical thinking through interactive, screen-light activities. They begin understanding patterns, directions, sequencing, and basic logic — forming the base for real coding later.

With creative puzzles, storytelling commands, and unplugged logic boards, children begin thinking in structured steps like real programmers.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Pre-coding skills: patterns, logic, directions, command-based games
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault for early reasoning development
- Hands-on kits with storytelling, game cards, and real-world applications
- Parent+Child Dashboard to visualize growth in logic and creativity
- Prepares your child for coding projects, Olympiads, and tech learning

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
UKG is a vital year for developing clear spoken English, correct pronunciation, confidence, and sentence building. Cosmic Communicators focuses on structured speaking, listening, vocabulary, and writing activities — while also introducing your child to basic reading comprehension and storytelling.

We focus on helping your child speak confidently with correct accent, express opinions, and begin writing independently.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Focus on spoken English, stage readiness, vocabulary expansion
- Picture talk, role play, phonics, sentence formation, and guided speech
- Early reading and writing with tracing, word families, and sight words
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! video speech tasks for clarity and fluency
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other..
- Builds expression, pronunciation, and early academic writing

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
In UKG, children begin applying math to their surroundings. MathMagicians’ Lab strengthens number fluency, measurements, patterns, and everyday math logic. Using real-world kits and game-based tools, children understand how math exists in their home, classroom, and environment.

Math becomes interactive and hands-on — through play, logic challenges, and visual problem-solving.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Focus on number sense, shapes, spatial awareness, and early arithmetic
- Activities include comparison, sequencing, calendar use, and measurement
- Brain Gym challenges and Real-World Math games
- Merit Badges for speed, accuracy, and logic
- Builds real-world fluency and readiness for primary-level math
